Articles.Content:
77 Industries presents:

 

 

It's finished. Dodge Challenger 1971. 100% Stock.
It has the same engines as my Dodge Charger 1969 but with a better chassis and weight distribution, this car is a bit lighter and has double the fuel capacity of the Charger. Top speed: 275 km/h (171 MPH). It also has a better crumble zone. It features the Boost Flap for fast braking while keeping the jets running at full speed, it also has brake lights.

Great for drifting!

Now, is there anyone with muscle car driving experience? I'd like to know if I've got the chassis/suspension settings right.

Download link: https://kerbalx.com/Azimech/77I--1971-Challenger-10
I will watch the vid when I get back home. I've driven on of your muscle car rovers before and it was a tonne of fun!
